name: Jelly Rally - Dodgers League
description:
Jump, stick and dodge trough deadly spikes and get highest score possible. Invite Facebook friends, blast trough obstacles and become the jelly champion!

Collect gold coins on the spiky road and unlock over forty different jellies, from sad zombie to kitten, robots and Fingertips! Find out hidden secrets! More jellies to come!

- Master simple controls! Only one swift finger needed ;)
- Stick on the ceiling, jump and slide on the walls!
- Dodge spikes or pop on them with colorful splash!
- Unlock over 40 quirky Jellies! More new jellies soon!
- Discover hidden surprises! Visit retro movie world and rainbow world ;)
- Beat your friends best scores! Share it on Facebook!
- Test your jump reflex! Tap, tap tap!
- Enjoy the lottery! Collect free prizes and enjoy the unexpected!
- Free to play!


This free game is Kids friendly - No blood! Only colorful nice candy splash! Easy controls! Its suitable for people of all ages, kids, girls, boys, adults... ;) Everyone can painfully enjoy Jelly Rally!

You think you're good at taping on your phone? Download now and test your skills. New jellies are coming!

Tap to jelly!
